rl_algorithms.dqn.agent Module

class rl_algorithms.dqn.agent.Agent(state_size, action_size, path, learning_rate=None, gamma=None, epsilon_decay=None, epsilon_max=None, epsilon_min=None, memory_size=None, batch_size=None, savepath=None, loadpath=None, seed=42)

Bases: object

Agent class for DQN-based reinforcement learning.

path

Path to save the model.

Type:

str

memory_size

Size of the replay memory.

Type:

int

gamma

Discount factor.

Type:

float

Learning rate for the optimizer.

Type:

float

Decay rate for epsilon.

Type:

Type:

Type:

Type:

Type:

__init__(state_size, action_size, path, learning_rate=None, gamma=None, epsilon_decay=None, epsilon_max=None, epsilon_min=None, memory_size=None, batch_size=None, savepath=None, loadpath=None, seed=42)

Initialize the Agent.

Parameters:

  • state_size (int) – Size of the state space.

  • action_size (int) – Size of the action space.

  • path (str) – Path to save the model.

  • learning_rate (float) – Learning rate for the optimizer.

  • gamma (float) – Discount factor.

  • epsilon_decay (float) – Decay rate for epsilon.

  • epsilon_max (float) – Maximum value of epsilon.

  • epsilon_min (float) – Minimum value of epsilon.

  • memory_size (int) – Size of the replay memory.

  • batch_size (int) – Batch size for training.

choose_action(state)

Choose an action based on the current state.

Parameters:

state (array) – Current state.

Returns:

Chosen action.

Return type:

int

decay()

Decay the exploration rate.

get_epsilon()

Get the current value of epsilon.

Returns:

Current value of epsilon.

Return type:

float

hard_update()

Perform a hard update of the target network.

load_model(ep_num)

Load the model from a file.

Parameters:

ep_num (int) – Episode number.

perform_training_step(states, actions, rewards, next_states, dones)

Perform a training step.

Parameters:

  • states (array) – Batch of current states.

  • actions (array) – Batch of actions taken.

  • rewards (array) – Batch of rewards received.

  • next_states (array) – Batch of next states.

  • dones (array) – Batch of done flags.

remember(state, action, reward, next_state, done)

Store an experience in the replay memory.

Parameters:

  • state (array) – Current state.

  • action (int) – Action taken.

  • reward (float) – Reward received.

  • next_state (array) – Next state.

  • done (bool) – Whether the episode is done.

replay(batch_size)

Train the agent with a batch of experiences.

Parameters:

batch_size (int) – Batch size for training.

save_model(episode_num)

Save the model to a file.

Parameters:

episode_num (int) – Episode number.
